column3: “🐝.. I suffer from Chronic Fatigue, Anxiety & severe RA Pain daily. I am curremtly enjoying this Uplifting Strain in a medible, Canna-Honey🍯 made by CLEAN CONCENTRATE (YHS PV ). Releases muscle tension fast. Smiles Galore HAPPY HERB!! Sour Cream honey is YUMMY in my AM tea, Delish in my choc-fudge Brownies, super even straight up". I purchased my honeybear at YHS Prescott Valley for $110. worth every penny! I have ...”"

“Excellent daytime Fibromyalgia pain and spasm relief without drowsiness. It sold out in 48 hours at my local dispensaries. I got the last gram in my area and can't wait to get more. It's a lot like Sugar Cookie, but with more pain relief, no paranoia and made me uplifted with no anxiety. Great for getting chores done...love it!”

“I was lucky enough to score amazing G13 roughly 13 years ago. I ended up buying all of it. So sweet, sticky and dank that I'm still drooling about her today. At the time it was the best smoke that I had ever consumed. Sour D has delicious deep roots and mixes well with almost everything. Crossing these two strains is fantastic. Sativa dom. with mild G13 sedation. Can be smoked all day with easy, not too foggy. Light ...”

“Seattle Quality Collective - Seattle, WA

A classic strain still alive in the North West, Thai is a strong Sativa that kills pain, and reduces stress while keeping one focused and on point while going about day-to-day business. A euphoric head high leaves the individual in a trance like state, which sets on slowly and picks up intensity as the day goes on lasting hours on a .5 g. bong toke. Thai is a strong variety...”
“Had a Blueberry Sour Cream" cut. Blueberry plus sour cream it was fantastic!  Great even high that killed my anxiety instantly.  Very smooth come down from a high starting off sativa
column4: and finishing with an amazing body high ( the blueberry cut is really felt here). Really did smell like sour cream.  Grown by Phat Panda in Washington State.  Awesome :P”"

column3:
“This sour cream I had was damn amazing. Started at the head, which was very warm and fuzzy, and moved down into the body which felt like I weighed a ton.

Very high recommendations.”

“Tried this a few times... lab led berry sour cream, in different batches. its OK but I found it to have a super dense bud that likes to powder. and the flavor a little musty. So, i admit being spoiled and when other sticky fluffy yumminess is available ill pass on this.”
“I was all melty before I sprinkled some hash on top. Now I'm just Velveeta.”
“I was all melty before I sprinkled some hash on top. Now I'm just Velveeta.”
“Alert and super focused, but very relaxing and happy. I got chores done that I'd been procrastinating forever...very singularly-focused and productive. I really dig it”

“Sometimes it's the only thing that can get me up to have a life.  I also have neuropathy arms and legs helps so much.  Blue dream,  mothers helper and so cap for really bad days mixed with sour cream. ♡”
“i love this smell its like some fruity berries an taste really good an makes me feel good like it should”

“Perfect for maximum relaxation.
And nighty night dabs”
“If this strain had a sound track it would be The Ramon's, I want to be sedated." But played at a slow 33 rpms. Heavy and sleepy for me
column4: but quite happily peaceful. Slept through the night. Feels like a cross between Deep Sleep and Jane Doe.  Highly recommended for bedtime.  Got at Yavapai”"

column3: “This isnt a review,  I just wanted to share the time I picked up some NY Cheese"
column5: soily SD that had been sprayed or soaked with SOUR CREAM WATER.  The other strain tasted like milk
column6: so I know he had a mildew problem
column7: (they use dairy products to cover it up)
column8: but SOUR CREAM for Sour Diesel?  Who makes that connection?!  No wonder the dude didnt let me pick and smell my pack like he normally did...”"

column3: “Heavy yielder - great aroma!  Like a mix between something citrus-y and skunky/diesel-y.  Great smoke!  Really puts you in a general, all-around good mood!”
“probably the best weed ive smoked better than blue dream very uplifted mood perfect if you have depression truly recommend”
“Gooooood stuff. Don't pass this one up. Very reliable, great sativa.”
“Wakes me up. Keeps me focused. Too much will put me out though.”
“I don't like sativa's or sativa favored hybrids but this one felt like an indica. Very nice relaxing calming effects.”
“Solid head high with a little body relaxation. If I smoke too much of it my eyes get to heavy and I get sleepy.”
“Heavy yielder - great aroma!  Like a mix between something citrus-y and skunky/diesel-y.  Great smoke!  Really puts you in a general, all-around good mood!”
“Very relaxing as it says, hits fast lasts for awhile.”
“If this strain had a sound track it would be The Ramon's, I want to be sedated." But played at a slow 33 rpms. Heavy and sleepy for me
column4: but quite happily peaceful. Slept through the night. Feels like a cross between Deep Sleep and Jane Doe.  Highly recommended for bedtime.  Got at Yavapai”"

column3: “This strain has a very smoothtaste , I am a Indica Dominant smoker and this strain just got added to my top five strains 👌💯”

“I also had the Phat Panda variation, Berry Sour Cream. Hated it. Made us both dizzy and was very hard to focus on things... not in the dreamy way that a purp will, but in a more scrambled unpleasant way. It's marketed as designer bud, and if this is what new designer bud is like, I'm sticking with the classics.”
“I love this strain! A nice up but dreamy sativa leaning high. I feel relief from head and eye tension/pain similar to the headband strain.”
“I absolutely love it 💯”
“Great hybrid”
“Whew!  Very nice.  Instant calmness.  On my first try of this I swear I could hear,  in a distant and echoey voice, Wooderson from Dazed and Confused saying 'alright alllllright...'”
“This strain gave a light and fluffy energetic high!”

“this strain is pretty average. I like it but it doesn't really do it for me. It's a good strain to mix other strains with, not a great strain for social settings and other activities. heavy couch lock and loss of motivation. biggest effect being insatiable hunger and sleepiness.”

“I'll have to try it again from another grower the one I had was ugly didn't taste very well and the high lasted about 10 minutes and was very very mild at that. but it gets 3 stars for it's medical benefits. this strain destroyed my headaches so for that three stars”

“Seattle Quality Collective - Seattle, WA

A classic strain still alive in the North West, Thai is a strong Sativa that kills pain, and reduces stress while keeping one focused and on point while going about day-to-day business. A euphoric head high leaves the individual in a trance like state, which sets on slowly and picks up intensity as the day goes on lasting hours on a .5 g. bong toke. Thai is a strong variety...”
“Very reliable high. Smells to high hell though.”
“Perfecto!!!”
“Got a gram of Sour Cream bubble hash from my dispensary and it's one of the best I have encountered. Very strong sativa profile, would smoke again.”

“very nice!
:)”
“This isn't a review,  I just wanted to share the time I bought some NY Cheese"  and it was a bad
column4: soily SD that had been sprayed with SOUR CREAM WATER to cover a mold/mildew issue. Who makes that connection!?  The other pickups smelled like milk (common folier spray antifungal)
column5: but the SD was Sour Cream dip

column1: Its hilarious because the guy always let me pick the jar and smell it

column3: “Frequent buyer .”
“This is a great strain! Hits hard and fast. Very nice even buzz. Amazing Kush taste. I'd be comfortable smoking this anytime of the day or night!”
“Really nice energetic and uplifting high. Good to focus on things and bake you up after a tiring day of work. Definitely recommendable!”
“Exactly what the description says... heavily sedating but not sleepy.  Very interesting smell makes this one unique.”

“this strain is pretty average. I like it but it doesn't really do it for me. It's a good strain to mix other strains with, not a great strain for social settings and other activities. heavy couch lock and loss of motivation. biggest effect being insatiable hunger and sleepiness.”
“horrible name”

“Great strain for hanging out, alone. I find that I'm not really social on this one. My high was more so, reflective. Great for watching a movie or falling into a YouTube black hole. Munchies aren't bad. Paranoia hit from time to time. The high doesn't last for very long but hits very quick.”

“very yummy . helps bring my appetite back . gives me energy if I use right before an activity and can put me to sleep if used right before bed . I love the taste . it instantly took my headache away”
“I absolutely love it 💯”

“I also had the Phat Panda variation, Berry Sour Cream. Hated it. Made us both dizzy and was very hard to focus on things... not in the dreamy way that a purp will, but in a more scrambled unpleasant way. It's marketed as designer bud, and if this is what new designer bud is like, I'm sticking with the classics.”
“smelled like chives! good high for stress relief”

“I like this sativa dom. hybrid alot--especially because it yields some indica effects, which I prefer. Looked and smelled nice, citrusy floraly dieselly. Nice for dog walks and nights in with friends. Gentle relief from the daily stress/fatigue/anxiety of life. Overall an uplifting yet relaxing experience.”

“This strain is okay, and I like it the most for daytime stress. To me, it felt very mild, and I was able to focus. The downside is that the effects wore of quickly, with the majority of it passed in under 3 hours, but that could be an upside too.”
“hits pretty hard head high compact dense bud slows time down a little. great stress relief.”
“This strain gave a light and fluffy energetic high!”
“Whew!  Very nice.  Instant calmness.  On my first try of this I swear I could hear,  in a distant and echoey voice, Wooderson from Dazed and Confused saying 'alright alllllright...'”
“I love this strain! A nice up but dreamy sativa leaning high. I feel relief from head and eye tension/pain similar to the headband strain.”
“Great hybrid”
“Very accurate, as this strain is great for stress relief.  Great for after work.  Or video games.  Or both.”

“Made me mellow, but alert at the same time. No big energy rush on this though. As said in the description of Sour Cream, it's an instant stress reliever. Gives a good body relaxation as well. I would smoke this in the evening or night time. 
Medical use, Stress and anxiety I do recommend! Makes an excellent headache and body pain reliever. 
Would smoke again.”

“I live with nerve pain, anxiety and mild depression. This one does a number on all of them! I got mine from Ross' Gold in Kelowna, BC. 

The initial impression is great. It presents very nicely; medium green buds with pretty dun orange orange trichromes. The nose is nice, like blue cheese and some kind of fruit. The taste is... Interesting. I really liked it. It's very sour and savoury. Not for everyone, though. 

Th...”

“Tried this strain a second time. It gets 5 stars now. Maybe the first go around seasoned me like a cast iron skillet, because it was a hug difference the second time. Very happy, energetic and relaxing strain. 
I'll put sour cream in my daily diet any day!”

“This strain was alright. It offered a really clear mind buzz along with giving an alright body high. I found myself very couch locked and even falling asleep. Its good for before bed, but i would avoid it during the day.”
“Great high. Definitely feel sedated and happy!”
“Very good strain, with a smell thats on the sweeter side to me. Had me feeling relaxed enough to still function.”

“G13 haze x Sour Diesel
A little lighter of a smoke compared to some preferences, but still certainly affective. Sativa dominant affects are present as are the relaxing Indica influence. Great for focus OR a mellow night in.”
“Very good flower. Smells nice, but strong, tastes pretty sweet, and leaves you with a really energetic and clear high.”
“Very fluffy , great all around weed . Appearance is beautiful and smells good. Little cerebral , overall good.”
“The effects are like an indica, its VERY SEDATING! I would not get this again unless I wanted to sleep all day.”

“Got a oz of Sour Cream. Only bad thing wad i only got a OZ. Fluffy yet dense buds,one downside to this batch was it turned to shake pretty easily,prob with cure not the strain im guessing. The smell was verys chemmy diesel, rather than sour. The effects are what you would expect,very uplifting and cerebral, with a non couchlocking bodyhigh laying underneath it. This along with Sugar Plum Haze are my favorite daytime ...”
“The cream de la crème for daytime , i immediatly felt uplift , talkative pretty happy smoke overall ! good for anxious ppl :)”

“So the strain of this I got was Berry Sour Cream, now I try and give all new pot I try a chance, but this did barely anything for me. When I acquired this strain it was when I started smoking again after a year long break from any cannabis use, so my tolerance was extremely low. now I'm sure the way this was grown may have been what was effecting it's potency, not that the strain itself is weak, but this specific cul...”

“I was really skeptical when I picked this one up. It actually had a very nice sweet G13 smell to it.  The nugs were big, round and dense. This was the first strain that truly felt like a hybrid". I didn't feel over tired and there was no paranoia. I felt mentally sharp and experience ample pain relief. For being so skeptical on the name
column4: I'm really digging this strain. Hoping it's restocked soon
